name: Bloom (itch) (thesquaregroot)
description:
A simple game for Godot Wild Jam #45, theme: Underground.

Bloom is a relaxing resource management game.  Take control of a sprouting plant as it attempts to thrive in its environment.

Grow the plant's roots to collect water and nutrients needs for the plant to grow.  Move the plant's leaves to regulate the amount photosynthesis taking place in the plant.  As the plant matures, grow it's stem until it eventually buds, blooms, and dies.
